languages.text: "Ах, шерин, так бывает лишь в сказках. Но мы ведь в сказке, не так ли?" {n}Капли воды стекают по щекам Джай, словно слезы, но это, наверное, все же не слезы — ведь она улыбается.{/n}
"Ah, shereen, that only happens in stories. But I suppose we are in one, aren't we?" {n}Drops of water track down Jae's cheeks like tears, but they cannot be tears, for she is beaming at you.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ах, шерин, так бывает лишь в сказках. Но мы ведь в сказке, не так ли?" {n}Капли воды стекают по щекам Джай, словно слезы, но это, наверное, все же не слезы — ведь она улыбается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ah, shereen, that only happens in fairy tales. But I suppose we are in a fairy tale, aren't we?" {n}Drops of water track down Jae's cheeks like tears, but they cannot be tears, for she is beaming at you.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ah, shereen, that only happens in fairy tales. But I suppose we are in a fairy tale, aren't we?" {n}Drops of water track down Jae's cheeks like tears, but they cannot be tears, for she is beaming at you.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ah, shereen, that only happens in fairy tales. But I suppose we are in a fairy tale, aren't we?" {n}Drops of water track down Jae's cheeks like tears, but they cannot be tears, for she is beaming at you.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Ah, shereen, that only happens in stories. But I suppose we are in one, aren't we?" {n}Drops of water track down Jae's cheeks like tears, but they cannot be tears, for she is beaming at you.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “啊，亲爱的，这种事情只会发生在故事里。不过我猜，咱们就是在故事里，是吧？”{n}水滴沿着婕伊的脸颊流了下来，仿佛眼泪一般。但那不可能是眼泪，因为她此刻笑靥如花。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen, that only happens in stories. But I suppose we are in one, aren't we?" {n}Drops of water track down Jae's cheeks like tears, but they cannot be tears, for she is beaming at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “啊，亲爱的，这种事情只会发生在童话故事里。不过我猜，咱们就是在童话故事里，是吧？”{n}水滴沿着婕伊的脸颊流了下来，仿佛眼泪一般。但那不可能是眼泪，因为她此刻笑靥如花。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「ああ、シャリーン、そんなのは物語の中だけだよ。でも、あたしたちは物語の中にいるんじゃない？」{n}水滴が涙のようにジェイの頬をつたうが、それは涙ではない。彼女はにこやかにあなたを見つめているのだから。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen, that only happens in stories. But I suppose we are in one, aren't we?" {n}Drops of water track down Jae's cheeks like tears, but they cannot be tears, for she is beaming at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、シャリーン、そんなのは物語の中だけだよ。でも、あたしたちは物語の中にいるんじゃない？」{n}水滴が涙のようにジェイの頬をつたうが、それは涙ではない。彼女はにこやかにあなたを見つめているのだから。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Ah, shereen, eso solo pasa en los cuentos. Pero estamos en uno, ¿verdad?». {n}Gotas de agua recorren las mejillas de Jae como si fueran lágrimas, pero con la sonrisa que ves en su cara no pueden serlo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen, that only happens in stories. But I suppose we are in one, aren't we?" {n}Drops of water track down Jae's cheeks like tears, but they cannot be tears, for she is beaming at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ah, shereen, eso solo pasa en los cuentos de hadas. Pero estamos en uno, ¿verdad?». {n}Gotas de agua recorren las mejillas de Jae como si fueran lágrimas, pero con la sonrisa que ves en su cara no pueden serlo.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Allons, shereen, ça n'arrive que dans les histoires, ça. Mais après tout, n'est-ce pas justement ce que nous vivons ? » {n}Des gouttes d'eau roulent sur les joues de Jae, mais il ne peut pas s'agir de larmes, puisqu'elle vous adresse un sourire lumineux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen, that only happens in stories. But I suppose we are in one, aren't we?" {n}Drops of water track down Jae's cheeks like tears, but they cannot be tears, for she is beaming at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Allons, shereen, ça n'arrive que dans les contes de fées, ça. Mais après tout, n'est-ce pas justement ce que nous vivons ? » {n}Des gouttes d'eau roulent sur les joues de Jae, mais il ne peut pas s'agir de larmes, puisqu'elle vous adresse un sourire lumineux.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ah, Shereen, so etwas gibt es nur in Geschichten. Aber wir befinden uns wohl auch gerade in einer Geschichte, nicht wahr?" {n}Wassertropfen laufen Jae wie Tränen die Wangen runter, aber eigentlich können es keine Tränen sein, da sie vor Freude strahlt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen, that only happens in stories. But I suppose we are in one, aren't we?" {n}Drops of water track down Jae's cheeks like tears, but they cannot be tears, for she is beaming at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ah, Shereen, so etwas gibt es nur in Märchen. Aber ich schätze, wir erleben gerade ein Märchen, oder?" {n}Wassertropfen laufen Jae wie Tränen die Wangen runter, aber eigentlich können es keine Tränen sein, da sie vor Freude strahlt.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen, that only happens in stories. But I suppose we are in one, aren't we?" {n}Drops of water track down Jae's cheeks like tears, but they cannot be tears, for she is beaming at you.{/n}

languages.text: "Şirinim, bu sadece hikâyelerde olur. Tabii biz de aslında bir hikâyeyi yaşıyoruz, değil mi?" {n}Su damlaları, Jae'ın yanaklarından birer gözyaşı gibi süzülse de yüzü mutlulukla parıldadığından gözyaşı olmaları mümkün değil.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ah, shereen, that only happens in stories. But I suppose we are in one, aren't we?" {n}Drops of water track down Jae's cheeks like tears, but they cannot be tears, for she is beaming at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ah şirinim, bu sadece hikâyelerde olur. Ama biz de zaten bir hikâyenin içindeyiz aslında, değil mi?" {n}Su damlaları Jae'ın yanaklarından birer gözyaşı gibi süzülüyor ama gözyaşı olmaları mümkün değil çünkü yüzü mutlulukla parıldıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
